snippet.title: USDA Ditches Food Pyramid for a Healthy Plate
snippet.description: ...and grains -- with a portion of dairy on the side -- will be the new U.S. Dietary Guideline icon. It replaces the 19-year-old food...replaced the 19-year-old food pyramid as the icon of the new U.S...

snippet.title: Why Anger Is the New Sex
snippet.description: How the Internet and TV are making you mad...Whether it's Wall Street bonuses, the Gulf oil fiasco, or cultural icons (David Letterman! Tiger Woods! Al Gore?!) flagrantly cheating on their wives,
